name: Gaurav Agarwal
experience: Read research paper on  Gosig consensus (Byzantine Consensus) and using this consensus built
blockchain from scratch including p2p, real-time transaction and block processing. By doing this
project, I was able to understand core blockchain concept, cryptography,
Did research on Plasma FrameWork and understood the core concept of blockchain second layer solution.
After this built a poc on top of plasma cash which create a scalable blockchain application.
Built a POC for a blockchain off-chain transaction(payment-channel). For that, I created a smart-contract
and signature schema. This application provides real-time transaction finality with blockchain
We are working on a project which aims to create a blockchain framework which will be generic enough
to give users accessibility to create their own blockchain application on top of it.
Successfully offered first released of 5G project last week which is a load balancer between other 5G
component. In this project the whole Apache Kafka part handled by me which is responsible for
inter-cluster Data transfer (replication). This project is a core part of Telecommunication and this
project handle how User Equipment (Ex- mobile) is attach detach with different network and
respectively their Rules & Charging Functions and communication with respective interfaces.
In this project, I also  worked on Alarms, Counters, Live Command Line Monitoring, and Thread Pool etc.
Learned new Technology such as Apache Kafka, J2EE, Java Advanced Framework (Http2, Netty server,
Logger, apache POI, JSON), used Java API of Cassandra, MongoDB, Neo4j and explored Hadoop, Hbase.
Developed an Application Which do analysis and Regression on Excel workbook data and convert that
into PPT having charts (bar, pie), table and make a prediction for the coming quarter.
